The workshop has hundreds of thousands of custom levels.
Such a fun game to play with some friends and completing the puzzles whilst screwing things up for each other is so fun.

an absolutely astonishing looking game, which is amazing given it's from 2011. although there are only a handful of characters in the game, they more than make up for it in sheer personality and comedy. the gameplay is nothing to snbeeze at either, with creative level designs that tie in with the amazing graphics and tough but gratifying puzzles. if you havent already played it, do it now.

this is one of the best games of all time and you should play it immediately
